name: Cool Bits
description: Slap this onto your favorite water bottle and be as cool as Bits. Warning: may cause other attendees at your next conference to dramatically over-hydrate just to keep staring at your bottle. This durable vinyl sticker is weatherproof, sunproof, and cool-proof.

name: Bits by Dre
description: Bits got some dope cans for his fat beats! Show the world that you like dogs who like hip hop with this tasteful vinyl sticker. Pairs well with a monitoring dashboard that slaps harder than your backlog. Bass-boosted. Latency-minimized.

name: Hockey Bits
description: Just as iconic as Gritty, and significantly less chaotic. Bits has laced up the skates and hit the ice, proving that a dog who can monitor your entire infrastructure can also stick-handle through any penalty kill. Five-on-five uptime guaranteed.

name: Learning Bits
description: Show that you're the head of the class. Bits has been hitting the books and acing every exam — much like your alert thresholds. Slap it on your laptop and let everyone in the coffee shop know that you take learning seriously. Gold star not included.

name: Money Bits
description: With good breeding and a little bit of luck, a good dog can rise to the top. Show your admiration for the top 1% with this fancy vinyl sticker. Monocle not included. Neither is the yacht. But the sticker? Absolutely.

name: Octo Bits
description: Last we saw Bits, he was snorkeling in the Cayman Islands. Not sure who this octopus is, but they're wearing his collar and they seem to have eight times the monitoring coverage. Suspicious. Delightful. Definitely sticker-worthy.

name: OG Bits
description: It's hard to beat a classic. The original Datadog logo on a durable vinyl sticker that belongs on every laptop, water bottle, and server rack in a 10-mile radius. Some say the OG Bits sticker has been running at 99.999% uptime since 2010. We believe it.

name: Rainbow Bits
description: Be as proud as Bits with this colorful vinyl sticker. Bits has always believed that the more colors you use, the easier it is to read your dashboards. This sticker is proof. Weatherproof, fade-proof, and ready to fly the full spectrum.

name: Space Bits
description: Everybody Laikas this vinyl sticker! (We would never send Bits into space alone without a safe recovery plan.) If our telemetry is correct, Bits is currently in low-earth orbit with a p99 latency of under 100ms and zero downtime. Houston has no problems.

name: Student Bits
description: Show the folks at the cafe that you're as smart (and obedient) as Bits! Bits graduates at the top of every cohort, even when the curriculum was written in six different programming languages. Lifelong vinyl sticker. The knowledge, sadly, is not included.

name: Stonk Bits
description: This sticker is so hot we're legally not allowed to tell you how valuable it is. It has consistently outperformed the broader sticker market since Q3 2021. Past performance is not indicative of future returns. This is not financial advice. Please monitor responsibly.

name: April 2022 Summit Denver Sticker
description: The year was 2022. Hundreds of observability enthusiasts converged on Denver to discuss the finer points of metrics, logs, and traces. The air was thin, the talks were excellent, and this commemorative vinyl sticker is the only proof you were there. Altitude not included.

name: Sunset Bits
description: Remember the amazing Miami sunsets of the 80s? Bits sure does. Pastel skies, neon dashboards, and Bits cruising on a jet ski with aviators on. Slap this everlasting vinyl sticker on your surfboard, standing desk, or vintage DeLorean. Bit-colored sunglasses not included.

name: AAPI Heritage Month Bits
description: Celebrate Asian American Pacific Islander Heritage Month with Bits! Vibrant, joyful, and impossible to look at without smiling — just like the engineers building our industry every day. Stick it somewhere it'll be seen. Representation matters, even in sticker form.

name: Sweatshirt (Crewneck)
description: Because you can't wear a hooded sweatshirt with a hooded jacket — that's too many hoods. This 100% cotton crewneck is engineered for maximum comfort during long debugging sessions, post-incident retros, and staring at dashboards waiting for that deploy to go green. Fits great. Washes well. Holds up under pressure.

name: Blue Jeans
description: Pairs well with our t-shirts, a strong cup of coffee, and a SLO holding steady in the green. Classic 5-pocket construction, durable denim, and a fit that says 'I ship code but I also own real pants.' Waist sizes 28–34. The waist size 34 is temporarily out of stock — blame the on-call rotation.

name: Circle Logo T-Shirt
description: Pairs perfectly with our blue jeans — and your production dashboard. A clean, minimalist Datadog circle logo on a soft, pre-shrunk tee. Whether you're presenting at all-hands, deploying to prod, or just getting groceries, this shirt communicates that you're the kind of person who has their monitoring set up. Respect.
